channel.title: Portals
channel.description:
I want to put a portal at coordinates 3255, 3430
I want it to teleport somewhere, I'll change coordinates to that later.
Can someone please provide a code and where do I put this?

item.title: Portals
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Argh, I don’t have a server on this computer.

Search

//QUEST_1

Everything UNDER that is clicking an object once, whether it’s originally there, or you added it.
The case number is the Id of the object.

Read full topic

item.title: Portals
item.dc:creator: @D_D_3 D D 3
item.description:
@D_D_3 wrote:

Ok do you wanna stop double posting before a mod comes and moderates you.?Now to make portals go into client and search for makeGlobalObject then add this under it
makeGlobalObject(3255, 3430, 2470, -3, 10);//Portal

Next search for case 132:
Scroll down and u will see something like this:

			if (objectID == 409 && ancients == 0) 
			{
			emotes = 2;
			updateRequired = true;
			setSidebaInterface(6, 12855);
			ancients = 1;
			sendMesage("You convert to ancient magic.");
			}

Add this ontop of that if (objectiD == 2475) //Portal
{
teleportToX = 2932;
teleportToY = 9910;
}
And change the telport to x and y to your cords.

Read full topic

item.title: Portals
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

case ####: { teleportToX = 3255; teleportToY = 3450; } break;

Read full topic
